tiles.title: Monthly cases with verbatim column
tiles.query:
//Monthly cases with verbatim column

Cases
| where CaseClosedDate >= ago(360d)
| where Surveys_QOSOverallVerbatim != ""
| where SupportProductId in ("17846") 
| project CaseClosedDate, Surveys_QOSOverallVerbatim 
| summarize VerbatumCount = count() by endofmonth(CaseClosedDate)

tiles.title: Most common support topics submitted per month
tiles.query:
//Most common support topics submitted per month

let topTopics = Cases
| where CaseCreatedDate >= ago(360d)
| where SupportTopic != ""
| where SupportProductId in ("17846")
| project SupportTopic, L1SupportTopic, L2SupportTopic, L3SupportTopic, CaseCreatedDate
| summarize TopSupportCount = count() by SupportTopic
| sort by TopSupportCount desc
| take 10
| extend isTop = true;
topTopics
| join (Cases) on SupportTopic
| where CaseCreatedDate >= ago(360d)
| where isTop = true
| where SupportProductId in ("15725","17846")
| extend month = endofmonth(CaseCreatedDate)
| summarize SupportCount = count() by month, SupportTopic

tiles.title: Most common root cases submitted per month
tiles.query:
//Most common root cases submitted per month

let topRootCauses = Cases
| where CaseCreatedDate >= ago(360d)
| where RootCause != ""
| where SupportProductId in ("17846")
| project RootCause, L1RootCause, L2RootCause, L3RootCause, L4RootCause, L5RootCause
| summarize TopRootCauseCount = count() by RootCause
| sort by TopRootCauseCount desc
| take 10
| extend isTop = true;
topRootCauses
| join (Cases) on RootCause
| where CaseCreatedDate >= ago(360d)
| where isTop = true
| where SupportProductId in ("15725","17846")
| extend month = endofmonth(CaseCreatedDate)
| summarize CauseCount = count() by month, RootCause

tiles.title: Region CSAT average
tiles.query:
//Region CSAT average

Cases
| where CaseCreatedDate >= ago(360d)
| where CSAT != ""
| where SupportProductId in ("17846")
| project CSAT, Incidents_CustomerRegion
| summarize CSATavg = avg(tolong(CSAT)) by Incidents_CustomerRegion
| sort by CSATavg

tiles.title: Last 30 days cases with verbatim column
tiles.query:
//Last 30 days cases with verbatim column

Cases
| where CaseClosedDate >= ago(30d)
| where Surveys_QOSOverallVerbatim != ""
| where SupportProductId in ("17846")
| project CaseClosedDate, Surveys_QOSOverallVerbatim
| sort by CaseClosedDate desc
